parameters.name: state
parameters.doc:
state to enable
  • render.STATE_DEPTH_TEST
  • render.STATE_STENCIL_TEST
  • render.STATE_BLEND
  • render.STATE_ALPHA_TEST ( not available on iOS and Android)
  • render.STATE_CULL_FACE
  • render.STATE_POLYGON_OFFSET_FILL

parameters.name: state
parameters.doc:
state to disable
  • render.STATE_DEPTH_TEST
  • render.STATE_STENCIL_TEST
  • render.STATE_BLEND
  • render.STATE_ALPHA_TEST ( not available on iOS and Android)
  • render.STATE_CULL_FACE
  • render.STATE_POLYGON_OFFSET_FILL

parameters.name: func
parameters.doc: depth test function, see the description for available values

parameters.name: func
parameters.doc: stencil test function, see the description for available values

parameters.name: ref
parameters.doc: reference value for the stencil test

parameters.name: mask
parameters.doc: mask that is ANDed with both the reference value and the stored stencil value when the test is done

parameters.name: sfail
parameters.doc: action to take when the stencil test fails

parameters.name: dpfail
parameters.doc: the stencil action when the stencil test passes

parameters.name: dppass
parameters.doc: the stencil action when both the stencil test and the depth test pass, or when the stencil test passes and either there is no depth buffer or depth testing is not enabled
